original_text: And Samuel said to all Israel, “Behold, I have obeyed your voice in all that you have said to me and have made a king over you.
korean_text: 사무엘이 온 이스라엘에게 이르되 보라 너희가 내게 한 말을 내가 다 듣고 너희 위에 왕을 세웠더니

sentences.original_text: And Samuel said to all Israel,
I have obeyed your voice in all that you have said to me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 내게 말한 모든 것에 순종하였고

sentences.original_text: and have made a king over you.
